name: MomDAO
description:
MomDAO aims to develop and operate the cryptocurrency trading platform, the Defi decentralized financial platform, the basic blockchain node and mining platform, and the NFT encrypted asset trading platform, and to provide unconditional support for full-time mothers who lack the source of income, and let them feel the beauty of social care.
Project operation income distribution plan: 1. Full-time mother Education Fund (certification) 30%; 2. MomDAO investors 30%; 3. Management cost and development and operation team 25%; 4. Sponsoring team 5%; 5. Artificial Intelligence Education Project Development Fund 10%.
We hope that through our efforts, the heavy financial burden of full-time mothers can be relieved and a better living environment for the healthy growth of children was created.
The initiating team has many years of successful and rich experience in project development and operation. Welcome to join MomDAO to create social value together, and you will get better returns.
payDisclosure: Welcome you success joined MomDAO! Please visit discord.
